summary: ANO ORDINANCE relating to the Improvement of Occidental Avenue South from South Washington Street to Yesler Way and a certain other street by constructing or reconstructing the support for the concrete walk and otherwise improving the same; as authorized by Ordinance No. 105435, creating Local Improvement District No. 6668, amending Section 2 of said Ordinance to authorize funds from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund to aid sais local improvement district and amending Section 3 of said Ordinance to exclude a certain property included in the local improvement district under Ordinance No. 105435.
